code:
%%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': {'primaryColor': '#ffcc00', 'edgeLabelBackground':'#ffffff', 'tertiaryColor': '#ffcc00'}}}%%
C4Context(c4Context, "Application Context", "Describes the high-level view of the system, including external entities.") {
    Container(app, "App Container", "Rust Application", "Hosts the core application logic, TUI, and manages the main event loop.") {
        Component(home, "Home Component", "Rust", "Component handling the Home view.")
        Component(session, "Session Component", "Rust", "Component managing user sessions.")
        Component(tui, "TUI Service", "Rust", "Text User Interface management and rendering.")
        
        app -[Uses]-> home
        app -[Uses]-> session
        app --> tui
        
        Component(messages, "Messages Module", "Rust", "Module to standardize communication formats.")
        Component(errors, "Error Handling Module", "Rust", "Centralizes error and exception management.")
        
        session --> messages
        session --> errors
        
        Component(types, "Types Module", "Rust", "Defines fundamental data structures and types.")
        Component(helpers, "Helpers Module", "Rust", "Provides shared utility functions.")
        
        messages --> types
        session --> helpers
    }
}
